ED70011X.moduleAims: To introduce the principles and practices of simulation-based education.
learningOutcomes: Describe the key concepts in simulation education.
Apply simulation techniques in educational settings.

assessments.title: A1 - Reflective Essay
assessments.description: Write a reflective essay on simulation education principles.

ED70011X.keyNotes:
Attendance is mandatory.
All assignments must be submitted via the portal.

ED70013X.moduleAims: Explore the use of digital tools in modern educational practice.

assessments.title: A1 - Digital Project
assessments.description: Create and present a digital learning project.

ED70013X.keyNotes:
Bring your own device.
Participation in group work is required.
